### Tender Description
Floating Plant Dredging 2023 - The Government of Canada, through Public Works and Government Services, is seeking a contractor to provide floating plant dredging services for Class "B" underwater materials at the following locations in New Brunswick: Pointe Sapin Channel, Les Aboiteaux Channel, Loggiecroft Channel, and Blacklands Channel. The scope of work includes:

* Mobilization and demobilization of all equipment necessary to make work progress for the entire contract
* Placing dredged material at the ocean disposal site at each of the wharf locations
* Execution of all work in strict accordance with specifications and accompanying drawings
* Completion of the project before August 10th, 2023

The estimated cost for this project is between $1,000,001 and $5,000,000 (inclusive of Taxes). [R	spin free B interventions from specifications]. The contractor is required to provide a submission guarantee and a contractual guarantee for construction works.
